item.description:
Ski Wheelers’ Canoe/Kayak Weekend

July 27th. - 29th., 2012

Ski Wheelers Ski Club

Kearsarge Road
1/4 mile from Mt Cranmore
North Conway, NH

Host: Wayne & Deb Potter
603-421-0822

Co-Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962     ob@tds.net

Steve Ob1. wrote: The cost be low are last years. I will send out the new prices in June.  Please join me and about 75 to 90 friends on Friday night, or Saturday morning. We will be floating down the Soco River on Saturday morning. Kayak rentals are $25. for the day The kayaking skill level required for this Event. Requires that your drinks be frozen the night before, and you have sun screen. You will also need a good gun for this. They have river pirates on this river. Some of those pirates are almost six years old. So, a good water gun is imperative to keep from being hosed. Beyond that, it will be a pleasent weekend. Meeting new people and doing new things.

What’s Included:

  • Friday and Saturday night Lodging (bunk beds with 2 -6 people per room
  • Friday Night - Drinks & Snacks Meet & Greet, Welcome Party
  • Saturday & Sunday - Make Your Own Breakfast (Breakfast foods provided)
  • Canoe (two per canoe) or Kayak Rental (Deduct $25 from price if you bring your own canoe or kayak)
  • Picnic lunch and soft drinks on the Saco river
  • Saturday night Lobster, Chicken and Steak dinner with corn on the cob, baked potato and desert (BYOB)

What to Bring:

  • A small cooler
  • A fleece sweater or jacket (It can get cool and windy on the river)
  • Foul weather gear (we go even if it rains!)
  • A dry bag or a large zip-lock bag to keep things dry
  • An arsenal of water-ejecting weaponry (please NO water balloons)
  • Insect repellent and sunscreen
  • Beach towel, bathing suit, water shoes/sandals or old sneakers
  • A sleeping bag or linens & blankets, pillow, bath towel and toiletries
  • Your sense of adventure, a willingness to help out, and your sense of humor

The directions to the lodge and a detailed schedule for the weekend will be published at a later date.

Guest Reservation Form

This reservation form and your check made out to Wayne Potter must be received by July 8th.

Mail to: Wayne Potter, 3 Angus Ave., Londonderry, NH 03053. Contact me at 603-421-0822 or wc.potter@comcast.net if you have any questions.

Please select one:

Canoe [ ] Kayak [ ] I will bring my own Canoe or Kayak [ ]

(Deduct $25- from the weekend package of $85 for anyone bringing their own canoe or kayak.)

(Note – Lodging is for Friday and Saturday nights)

You may select one, two or all three of the dinner entrees. Please order ONLY what you will eat.

 

Guest:

Name: Weekend Package $85 + Lodging $48 = $

Saturday dinner selection/s: ( ) Lobster ( ) Chicken ( ) Steak
item.name: Canoeing, Kayak Weekend
